list.en: I wanted to get a medical checkup.
The nurse is taking my blood pressure.
I had my stomach examined by an endoscope.
I have just received the test results.
The results showed that I had several health problems.
list.cn: 检查结果显示我有几个健康问题。

list.en: I had to undergo further tests.
list.cn: 我必须接受进一步的检查。

list.en: The doctor advised me to start exercising.
I filled out the medical checkup questionnaire.
My blood pressure is a bit high.
You need to take some medicine and rest in bed.
list.cn: 你需要吃点药，卧床休息。

list.en: The cold medicine made me sleepy.
This is to keep the fever down.
I'm afraid I've got a temperature.
Let me take your temperature first.
list.cn: 让我先量一下你的体温。

list.en: Please put this thermometer under your armpit.
It looks as if it's scarlet fever.
I've got a splitting headache and I feel very exhausted.
list.cn: 我头痛欲裂，感到非常疲惫。

list.en: If I have a headache, I will take an aspirin.
list.cn: 如果我头痛，我会吃一片阿斯匹林。

list.en: There is a throbbing pain in my temples.
Don't just try to put up with your toothache, go and see the dentist.
list.cn: 不要只是忍着牙痛，去看牙医吧。

list.en: It is hard to stand the pangs of a toothache.
I couldn't sleep well with my toothache.
Nothing works with my toothache now.
list.cn: 现在我的牙痛什么也治不了。

list.en: My toothache is killing me. I can't stand it.
list.cn: 我牙痛得要命。我受不了了。

list.en: Does it hurt to have it taken out?
My first tooth on the right hurts.
I think one of the back ones at the top is having most of trouble.
list.cn: 我想最后面的那个最麻烦。

list.en: I feel pain here whenever I drink something cold.
I think you need a shot to deaden the pain first.
list.cn: 我觉得你需要先打一针止痛。

list.en: Does it hurt when I press here?
I have a gripping pain in the abdomen.
I have a pain in the lower abdomen.
I have a pain in my side.
It's not a sharp pain, just sort of a dull ache.
list.cn: 不是一阵剧痛，只是一种隐痛。

list.en: Why do you have black eyes?
list.cn: 为什么你的眼睛是黑的?

list.en: I lie awake all night long.
list.cn: 我整夜躺在床上睡不着。

list.en: Have you tried some sleeping pills?
I can't seem to stay awake.
The whole night I was light headed and half asleep.
list.cn: 整个晚上我都昏昏沉沉，半睡半醒。

list.en: Do you sleep well last night?
It must be an allergy. Do you have any aspirin?
list.cn: 一定是过敏了。你有阿司匹林吗?

list.en: Are you allergic to any medication?
Can you tell me some symptoms of the sub health?
list.cn: 你能告诉我亚健康的一些症状吗?

list.en: Do you know how to prevent it?
Subhealth also called the third state or gray state.
list.cn: 亚健康状态又称第三状态或灰色状态。

list.en: Most of us are sub health.
list.cn: 我们大多数人都处于亚健康状态。

list.en: Do we need pay some attention to diet?
Sub health is a borderline state between health and disease.
list.cn: 亚健康是介于健康和疾病之间的一种边缘状态。

list.en: The doctors say that people should eat less salt and sugar and eat more vegetables and fruits.
list.cn: 医生说人们应该少吃盐和糖，多吃蔬菜和水果。

list.en: I'm starting to have weak vision.
There is something wrong with my eyes.
I lost my appetite a week ago.
I don't feel like eating anything.
I don't want to eat anything. I'm nauseating.
list.cn: 我什么都不想吃。我恶心。

list.en: I have been vomiting all night.
I vomited all the food I had eaten.
Vomiting also occurs in most patients.
list.cn: 大多数患者还会出现呕吐。

list.en: The doctor said that I needed to have my tonsils taken out in an operation.
list.cn: 医生说我需要动手术切除扁桃体。

list.en: You must be hospitalized right now.
You'll have to be operated on for appendicitis.
I'm afraid you will have to be operated on.
